name: CONTAIN (itch)
description:
I've been working on this physics engine for a while now, and I've finally paired it with some actual gameplay! You play as Captain Spaceship, a brave square. Fly around shooting the green circles and rectangles until you find the boss. Afterwards you'll have to find your way back to the entrance before everything explodes. 

You can upgrade your ship too, its pretty fun stuff if you ask me :)

I'M RELEASING ANOTHER UPDATE ON AUGUST FIRST GET STOKED.

I cranked out a lot of new features in the last couple weeks. Time for some polish and a maybe a Mac port!
